mapper.select:
select a.BOARD_NO, a.EMP_NO, a.BOARD_TITLE, a.BOARD_HIT, a.REG_DATE, a.MOD_DATE, a.BOARD_CONTENT, a.FILENAME, b.EMP_NO, b.TEAM_NO, b.NAME from media_board a join emp b on a.EMP_NO = b.EMP_NO
AND a.board_no=#{board_no}
AND a.board_title LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
AND b.name LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
order by board_no desc
mapper.insert: insert into media_board(board_no,board_title,board_content,emp_no,reg_date,board_hit,mod_date,filename) values(board_pk_seq.nextval, #{board_title}, #{board_content}, #{emp_no}, to_char(SYSTIMESTAMP AT TIME ZONE 'Asia/Seoul','YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'), 0, to_char(SYSTIMESTAMP AT TIME ZONE 'Asia/Seoul','YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'), #{filename} )
mapper.update: update media_board set board_title = #{board_title}, board_content = #{board_content}, mod_date= to_char(SYSTIMESTAMP AT TIME ZONE 'Asia/Seoul','YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'), filename= #{filename} where board_no = #{board_no}
mapper.select: select a.BOARD_NO, a.EMP_NO, a.COMMEND_CONTENT, a.COMMEND_NO, a.REG_DATE, c.NAME from MEDIA_BOARD_COMMEND a inner join MEDIA_BOARD b on a.BOARD_NO = b.BOARD_NO inner join emp c on a.emp_no = c.EMP_NO where a.board_no = #{board_no} order by board_no desc
mapper.insert: insert into media_board_commend(commend_no, board_no, emp_no, commend_content, reg_date, mod_date) values ( COMMEND_PK_SEQ.nextval, #{board_no}, #{emp_no}, #{commend_content}, to_char(SYSTIMESTAMP AT TIME ZONE 'Asia/Seoul','YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'), to_char(SYSTIMESTAMP AT TIME ZONE 'Asia/Seoul','YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') )
